about_the_game:
Developed by 1 guy, our aim was to give life to the famous Hong Kong urban legend.

BISQUE DOLL is a short game. The game is about 40min-60min long. Though this game has two endings.
This game contains disturbing scenes.
Please note that this game is not a typical horror game, but a horror-themed adventure game.

Key Features:
  • Survival horror: BISQUE DOLL will constantly try and hunt you while you explore.
  • Save system: You can save your progress manually.
  • Immersive experience: An atmospheric, realistic graphics intensifies the experience.
  • Hong Kong horror-themed adventure: Hong Kong horror film inspired environment and mood.
  • Two Endings: There are good and bad.

BISQUE DOLL is a Hong Kong urban legend
About a year ago
My mother bought a pair of bisque dolls
That's for my sister's room decoration
My grandma told me since I was young
When you put away the bisque doll
Don't keep her in a dark corner
Or in the cabinet that nobody cares about
All in all, don’t ignore him, care about him
Otherwise something will happen at home

name: BISQUE DOLL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel/Amd
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
